short_description: 100W Total Power, 3 Ports for Simultaneous Charging ​---- This 3port USB-C charger block comes with a 65W USB - C port (PD 3.0 certified). It can charge your MacBook Pro to 50% in just 30 minutes. Meanwhile, there is a 20W USB - C port for fast charging of iPhones and Android phones, and an 18W USB - A port for AirPods, tablets or other USB - A devices. All these three ports can work at the same time! You don't need to unplug one device to charge another anymore. Your MacBook, phone and earbuds can be charged together at high speed

​​Universal Compatibility: 1 Charger for All Your Devices​​ ---- Are you tired of carrying multiple chargers? This 100W block is fully compatible with ​​PD - enabled MacBooks Pro/Air​​, ​​iPads Pro/Air​​, ​​iPhone 17/16/15/XR/14/13/12/11/X Series​​, ​​Samsung Galaxy S25/S24+/Note​​ series, ​​Google Pixels​​, ​​Switch​​, ​​for AirPods​​ and almost any USB - C/USB - A device. You can charge your entire tech collection from just one compact adapter, which is perfect for travel, work or home use

Smart Safety Protection for Peace of Mind​​ ---- With intelligent thermal sensors, this charger can keep the temperature under 115℉ to ensure the safety of your devices and family. It also provides protection against overcurrent, overvoltage, overheating and short circuits. In addition, the fire - retardant casing offers an extra layer of safety. You can charge your kids' devices overnight or work late without any worry

GaN Tech: Small Size, Massive Power (2 - Pack Convenience)​​ ---- Made with advanced Gallium Nitride (GaN) technology, this charger is 30% smaller than traditional 100W models. It's light enough for travel but powerful enough to charge laptops. The 2 - pack design allows you to place one at home/in the office and even take one on trips. It can eliminate the "charger chaos" in every place you go

​​2 - Pack Value: Charge Multiple Rooms & Devices​​ ---- Get double the power at a lower cost! You can equip your bedroom, home office and travel bag with premium fast charging. This 2 - pack can save you money in the long run as you don't need to buy separate chargers. And it ensures that every room is ready to charge devices in case of emergencies. It's ideal for families, students and remote workers
